scripts.clear-adb: ./android/gradlew --stop && adb kill-server && cd android && ./gradlew clean && adb devices && cd ..
scripts.android-bundle: react-native bundle --platform android --dev false --entry-file index.js --bundle-output android/app/src/main/assets/index.android.bundle --assets-dest android/app/src/main/res
scripts.android-bundle-debug: react-native bundle --platform android --dev true --entry-file index.js --bundle-output android/app/src/main/assets/index.android.bundle --assets-dest android/app/src/main/res
scripts.android-reset: rm -rf node_modules && rm -rf yarn.lock && rm -rf android/app/build && yarn
scripts.ios-bundle: react-native bundle --platform ios --dev false --entry-file index.js --bundle-output ios/main.jsbundle
scripts.ios-reset: rm -rf node_modules && rm -rf yarn.lock && rm -rf ios/Pods && rm -rf ios/build && rm -rf ios/Podfile.lock && yarn && cd ios && pod install && cd ..
